content:
As you make your way to the crypt, you send messages to both Michael and Thomas, asking them to meet you there at 3pm sharp. You know that the crypt is a secure and protected location, making it an ideal place to discuss sensitive matters related to the supernatural.

As you approach the crypt, you see Michael and Thomas waiting for you outside. Michael nods in greeting, his sword at his side, while Thomas gives you a wry smile.

"What's the situation, Harry?" Michael asks, his voice serious.

"I think the local vampire gang might be up to something big," you explain, filling them in on the details of your recent encounter with the demon and the cryptic message on the piece of paper.

Thomas frowns, his brow furrowed in concern. "A master vampire? That's bad news, Harry. Those guys don't mess around."

"I know," you say grimly. "That's why I need your help. We need to figure out what the vampires are planning and put a stop to it before it's too late."

Michael nods in agreement. "I'll do whatever I can to help, Harry. You know that."

Thomas nods as well. "Count me in. But we need more information before we can take any action. We need to find out who this master vampire is, and what he wants."

You all agree that the first step is to gather more information. You decide to split up and investigate different parts of the city, looking for any clues that might lead you to the vampire master. You make plans to reconvene at the crypt in 24 hours to share what you've learned and come up with a plan of action.

As you part ways with Michael and Thomas, you know that the road ahead will be difficult and dangerous. But with your friends at your side, you're ready to face whatever comes your way.
